text:
With Qonda we have a solution,
a multi-language solution,

which made it easier
for corporate communication

so that everyone can speak in
its mother language, so the communication

and everything is quite easier,
than if you have not the right language.
We have customers with kickoffs in up

to 20 countries
and up to 17 languages, which we provide

and where we have up to
8,000 - 9,000 employees, which joining,

for example, a kickoff meeting
or a product presentation.

The problem which we had to solve
was the scaling, because

when you have a look to the live streams,
it's not every day a live

stream happens with a customer. So,
we have to reduce it to zero.

The reason why we went to AWS was that
there are so many different services

and they support us all around the world
with the hosting.
And so it was completely scalable

and flexible for our solution,
what we are looking for.

This is the complete support,
the complete package we have with AllCloud,

is exactly what we need,
and because without this experience

and without this support,
it's not possible to grow very fast.
